news_header: Heikki Malinen's recipe in Outokumpu needs a new narrative as Neste's performance report disappoints investors. CEO Heikki Malinen has a lot on his plate, and the transformation schedule for the Porvoo refinery is now in jeopardy, according to stock exchange editor Silva Rehn.
news_original_title: Neste tarvitsee uuden tarinan – Heikki Malinen käytti samaa reseptiä Outokummussa
